screens.title: Pay with your supermarket card
screens.content: Here you can add your supermarket card as a payment method. To edit the settings of this payment method or delete it, select the card in your Wallet.

faqs.title: Which supermarket cards can I add?
faqs.body: You can add only supermarket cards that allow you to pay. Supermarket cards that allow you to collect points or get access to discounts only are not valid.

screens.title: Pay with your PagoBANCOMAT card
screens.content: Here you can add your PagoBANCOMAT card as a payment method. To edit the settings of this payment method or delete it, select the card in your Wallet. Before proceeding with the addition of your PagoBANCOMAT cards, please read the privacy policy.

faqs.title: Why can't I find my bank?
faqs.body: Probably your PagoBANCOMAT card has been issued by a different bank. If you press “Add”, IO will search for all the PagoBANCOMAT cards in your name based on your tax code, which is deducted from the SPID or CIE you used to log in.

screens.title: Pay with a credit, debit, or prepaid card
screens.content: Here you can add your credit, debit, or prepaid card as a payment method. To edit the settings of this payment method or delete it, select the card in your Wallet.

faqs.title: Where do I find the security code?
faqs.body: The security code, also called CVV or CVS, is a three-digit code on the back of your card. In American Express cards it's called CID, it has four digits and is located on the front. If you can't find the security code, your card probably isn't enabled for online payments.

faqs.title: I’m having trouble adding my card. What can I do?
faqs.body:
In this case, we recommend that you contact your bank. The reasons may be different, but the most frequent cases are: 

* Your card is not enabled for online purchases; 

* Your card has been “paused”

*;You have not yet activated the 3DS service, a security system related to online payments. You can see a detailed list of supported methods on the [Payment Methods page](https://io.italia.it/metodi-pagamento/).

screens.title: Your supermarket card
screens.content: Here you can see the details of this payment method, edit the settings or delete it from the Wallet.

screens.title: Your PagoBANCOMAT card
screens.content: Here you can see the details of this payment method, edit the settings or delete it from the Wallet.

faqs.title: How can I set this payment method as favorite?
faqs.body: Your payment methods are displayed as cards in the top part of the screen. Select the card of this method and set it as favorite.

faqs.title: How can I delete this payment method?
faqs.body: Your payment methods are displayed as cards in the top part of the screen. Select the card you want to delete and press on “Delete this payment method”.

faqs.title: Why is the bank's name and logo different from the name and logo on my card?
faqs.body: Your PagoBANCOMAT card has probably been issued by a different bank. This happens mostly with online banks or in case of mergers.

faqs.title: Why does it say my card is not compatible with in-app payments?

screens.title: Your PayPal account
screens.content: Here you can see the details of this payment method, edit the settings or delete it from the Wallet.

faqs.title: How can I set this payment method as favorite?
faqs.body: Your payment methods are displayed as cards in the top part of the screen. Select the card of this method and set it as favorite.

faqs.title: How can I delete this payment method?
faqs.body: Your payment methods are displayed as cards in the top part of the screen. Select the card you want to delete and press on “Delete this payment method”.

screens.title: Your card
screens.content: Here you can see the details of this payment method, edit the settings or delete it from the Wallet.

faqs.title: How can I set this payment method as favorite?
faqs.body: Your payment methods are displayed as cards in the top part of the screen. Select the card of this method and set it as favorite.

faqs.title: How can I delete this payment method?
faqs.body: Your payment methods are displayed as cards in the top part of the screen. Select the card you want to delete and press “Delete this payment method”.

screens.title: What can you do in your Wallet
screens.content: In the Wallet you can find the payment methods you have added, the bonuses and initiatives you have joined and the history of transactions made with pagoPA, the platform for payments to the Public Administration. Here, you can also pay all the payment notices with the pagoPA logo.

faqs.title: How can I pay on IO?
faqs.body: You can pay with credit, debit and prepaid cards or with PayPal. You can find the updated list of available methods on the [payment methods page](https://io.italia.it/metodi-pagamento).

faqs.title: How do I add a payment method?
faqs.body: Go to the Wallet, press “Add”, and then “Payment method”. Select the method you want to add and enter the required information.

faqs.title: What bonuses, discounts or other initiatives can I apply for?
faqs.body: Go to Wallet, select “Add” and “Discounts, bonuses and other initiatives”. You will see a list with all the bonuses and initiatives you can apply for through IO.

faqs.title: I have trouble adding a payment method. What can I do?
faqs.body: Go to the [payment method addition status page](ioit://CREDIT_CARD_ONBOARDING_ATTEMPTS_SCREEN), select the failed addition attempt and contact Support.

faqs.title: How can I delete a payment method?
faqs.body: Your payment methods are displayed as cards in the top part of the screen. Select the card you want to delete and press “Delete this payment method”.

faqs.title: I have trouble with a payment. What can I do?
faqs.body: Go to [your payment status page](ioit://PAYMENTS_HISTORY_SCREEN), select the failed payment attempt and contact Support.

faqs.title: Where do I find the payments I have made?
faqs.body: In the Wallet you will find a list of successful payments you have made through IO. The list also includes payments made through the partner institutions' website or app, if you logged in with SPID.

faqs.title: Can I pay a notice that I did not receive through IO?
faqs.body: Yes, if the notice features the pagoPA logo and QR code or Notice Code. To do so, go to the Wallet, scan the QR or enter the Notice Code and complete the payment.

faqs.title: What is a QR code?
faqs.body:
The QR code is a square image made of white and black elements. When you scan it with a device's camera, it provides direct access to digital content, such as a website, a payment, or an item.
The QR code you find on payment notices is linked to a Notice Code. If you go to your Wallet, press 'Pay Notice' and scan the code with your camera, you can pay the notice without having to manually enter information such as a description, amount or tax code.

faqs.title: What is pagoPA?
faqs.body: pagoPA is a platform that makes payments to the Public Administration easier, safer and more transparent. Among other benefits, it helps increase the use of e-payment methods and make individuals able to choose how to pay, highlighting the commission costs. To learn more, [go to the pagoPA website](https://www.pagopa.gov.it/).

faqs.title: How can I learn more about digital payments?
faqs.body:
In order to learn more about the topics of your interest related to the world of payments, you can read the resources provided by Banca d’Italia as part of its Financial Education programs, such as the [dedicated section](https://economiapertutti.bancaditalia.it/pagare/) of the website [L’Economia per tutti](https://economiapertutti.bancaditalia.it/) and the [Guide to Payments in Electronic Commerce]. 

For example, if you want to learn more about the payment methods you can add to the Wallet of the IO app, you can read the dedicated information sheets, such as [credit card](https://economiapertutti.bancaditalia.it/pagare/carta-di-credito/), [debit card](https://economiapertutti.bancaditalia.it/pagare/carta-di-debito/), [prepaid card](https://economiapertutti.bancaditalia.it/pagare/carta-prepagata/), [co-badge card](https://economiapertutti.bancaditalia.it/pagare/carte_co-badge_multifunzione/) or other digital services, [such as PayPal](https://economiapertutti.bancaditalia.it/notizie/parliamo-di-pagamenti-elettronici-e-online/#B4).

screens.title: Add the second network of your PagoBANCOMAT card
screens.content: In order to properly add the international network associated to your PagoBANCOMAT card, we need to know if you have ever used this card online, so that we can redirect you to the relevant page.

faqs.title: How do I understand if my card is enabled for online payments?
faqs.body:
Your card must have a security code: it is a 3 digit code and is printed on the back. If you can't find it, it means that you can only use your card in stores.

 Also make sure that you have enabled the 3D Secure service (Mastercard Identity Check for Mastercard cards and Verified By Visa/Visa Secure for Visa cards). For more information, go to your home banking or contact your bank.

faqs.title: My card has the security code, but I still can't add it to the Wallet.
faqs.body:
After entering your card details, your bank runs a check, usually via SMS or with a notification through its app. Follow the instructions given by your bank and, in case of trouble, contact their customer service.

If you do not receive any message (or the transaction is denied) it means that your card is not enabled for online payments. Contact your bank and ask how to activate 3D Secure (Mastercard Identity Check for Mastercard cards and Verified By Visa/Visa Secure for Visa cards).

faqs.title: I have already added the second network. What should I do?
faqs.body: If you have already added the international network to the Wallet as a “debit/credit card”, there is no need to add the card again with this feature.

screens.title: Add the second network of your PagoBANCOMAT card
screens.content: This feature allows you to search for all the cards with international network (Maestro, Mastercard, Visa and V-Pay) in your name.

faqs.title: Can I add cards with an international network?
faqs.body: Yes, you can add debit or credit cards with an international network (Maestro, Mastercard, VISA and V-Pay), even if they are not enabled for online payments. The cards must be in your name and issued by the [participating banks](https://io.italia.it/cashback/carta-non-abilitata-pagamenti-online).

faqs.title: Why can't I find any cards?
faqs.body: The service searches only for international network cards in your name. Make sure that the card is actually in your name and is issued by one of the [participating banks](https://io.italia.it/cashback/carta-non-abilitata-pagamenti-online).

screens.title: Add the second network of your PagoBANCOMAT card
screens.content: Here you can see all the cards in your name with an international network (Maestro, Mastercard, Visa and V-Pay), issued by the banks participating in the service. If you don't want to add one of the cards listed, press 'Skip' and go to the next one.

faqs.title: Why is the expiration date different?
faqs.body: In some cases, the expiration date displayed in the app may be different from the date printed on the card, but this does not affect the addition.

faqs.title: Why is the card number different?
faqs.body: IO shows you the last 4 digits of the international network. This number is also indicated on the receipts of purchases made with this network. In some cases, the card may show a different number, but this does not affect the addition.

faqs.title: I have already added the second network, what should I do?
faqs.body: If you have already added the international network to the Wallet as a “debit/credit card”, there is no need to add the card again with this feature.

screens.title: Your card with international network
screens.content: Here you can see the details of your international network card. You can see the logo of the bank that issued the card, the expiration date and the logo and number of the international network.

faqs.title: What can I do here?
faqs.body:
You can enable or disable some features for this payment method.

 You can also delete this payment method from your Wallet.

faqs.title: Why is the bank's name and logo different from the name and logo on my card?
faqs.body: Your card has probably been issued by a different bank. This happens mostly with online banks or in case of mergers.

faqs.title: Why is the expiration date different?
faqs.body: In some cases, the expiration date displayed in the app may be different from the date printed on the card, but this does not affect the addition.

faqs.title: Why is the card number different?
faqs.body: IO shows you the last 4 digits of the international network. This number is also indicated on the receipts of purchases made with this network. In some cases, the card may show a different number, but this does not affect the addition.

screens.title: Donations Ukraine
screens.content: In this page, you can make a donation to charities assisting the civilian victims of the crisis in Ukraine.

faqs.title: How can I make a donation?
faqs.body: To donate, choose a charity from the list. Then select the amount you want to donate and press 'Continue'. Use a supported payment method or select it from your Wallet. Finally, press 'Pay' to complete the donation.

faqs.title: What payment methods can I use to make the donation?
faqs.body: You can donate with a Visa, Maestro and Mastercard credit, debit or prepaid card and with PayPal.

faqs.title: Is there a minimum amount?
faqs.body: Yes, you can donate from a minimum of €5 to a maximum of €200. If you want to donate higher amounts, you can repeat the donation.

faqs.title: Is there a commission cost associated with the donation?
faqs.body: If you donate with a Visa, Maestro and Mastercard credit, debit or prepaid card, no commissions are charged.

faqs.title: After donating, I did not receive the email with the receipt. What can I do?
faqs.body: After donating, you will receive an email with the receipt. If you don't, check your spam folder and make sure the address you find under Profile > Your Information is correct. We recommend that you keep your receipt, along with original documentation of the payment (such as the bank or credit card statement) for tax purposes.

faqs.title: I represent a charity: can I participate in the initiative?
faqs.body: For information on how to participate in the initiative, email affari.istituzionali@pagopa.it.
